Trademark Registration in USA
Marcaria.com will process the Registration of your Trademark in USA through the following 3 Steps
Step 1 - Trademark Comprehensive Study
Before filing your trademark in USA it is important that you evaluate possible obstacles that may arise during registration process. Our Trademark Comprehensive Study will not only list similar trademarks (graphic & phonetic) that may conflict with yours, but also give you an Attorney's opinion about registration probabilities and the class(es) that belong your product/services.
View Service Price
Trademark Class Recommendation
Graphic & Phonetic Similarity Trademark Search
Trademark Attorneys Analysis & Advice
Step 2 - Trademark Registration Request
Our Attorneys will file your Trademark Application in USA and will carry out all needed tasks before the Trademark Office in USA in order to obtain registration approval. As soon as your trademark is filed we will send you a filing report which will include application number and date, plus a scanned copy of filed trademark application in USA.
View Service Price
Process Handled by Experienced Trademark Attorneys
Filing Report & Scanned Copy of Application
Online Tracking of the Registration Process
Step 3 - Trademark Registration Certificate
Once your Trademark Application is approved, our Attorneys will complete all necessary requirements in order to obtain the Registration Certificate in USA. After the Certificate is issued, it will be forwarded to your address along with a Registration Report specifying registration number, registration date and any special consideration that should be taken into account in USA.
View Service Price
Process Handled by Experienced Trademark Attorneys
Registration Certificate & Report Delivered to your Address
Monitor & Reminder of important dates
Frequently Asked Question
The Registration Process
How long does the registration process takes?
You have a product and you think you have a name for it, now how do you know if you can really use that name, it may happen that you are using a registered trademark name. Many people begins using a name without knowing if they really can use the name, and they put up big marketing campaigns with names that later they find they cannot use. Searching for your trademark before you choose a name is a wise decision so you avoid investing time and energy in names that you cannot use.
What is the price of the registration process?
First thing is to define the class you want to register, in the following link you will find a trademark class search engine where you put your product/service and it will tell you the class or classes you should register.
After you have determined your class, then you must try different combination of your name, for example if you are searching for AMAZON, you may look for AMASON, HAMAZON, etc. Try different combination as much as possible.
Trademark Search may be difficult and time consuming if you don’t have the expertise. Also there are several countries in which there are no online trademarks database and you have to go physically to Trademark Office and ask for list of trademarks.
In order to facilitate this, our company provides a Trademark Comprehensive Study. The Study will inform you about the classes where your trademark should register, then it will list you similar trademarks and finally the Study will give you a recommendation about registration possibilities and use of your trademark.
Click in the following link to order your Trademark Search Report for USA.
For other countries, please go to International Trademarks and then select your country.
Step 1 Trademark Comprehensive Study
Why do I need the Study?
You have a product and you think you have a name for it, now how do you know if you can really use that name, it may happen that you are using a registered trademark name. Many people begins using a name without knowing if they really can use the name, and they put up big marketing campaigns with names that later they find they cannot use. Searching for your trademark before you choose a name is a wise decision so you avoid investing time and energy in names that you cannot use.
What is the content of the Study?
First thing is to define the class you want to register, in the following link you will find a trademark class search engine where you put your product/service and it will tell you the class or classes you should register.
After you have determined your class, then you must try different combination of your name, for example if you are searching for AMAZON, you may look for AMASON, HAMAZON, etc. Try different combination as much as possible.
Trademark Search may be difficult and time consuming if you don’t have the expertise. Also there are several countries in which there are no online trademarks database and you have to go physically to Trademark Office and ask for list of trademarks.
In order to facilitate this, our company provides a Trademark Comprehensive Study. The Study will inform you about the classes where your trademark should register, then it will list you similar trademarks and finally the Study will give you a recommendation about registration possibilities and use of your trademark.
Click in the following link to order your Trademark Search Report for USA.
For other countries, please go to International Trademarks and then select your country.
